## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G28040](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G28040)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>VFP4</u>
- **Gene Name:** VIRF INTERACTING PROTEIN 4
- **Description:**   DNA-binding storekeeper protein-related transcriptional regulator;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2143764
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_129879C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No obvious morphological defect.Mutants do show a changes in the expression (reduction) of genes involved in stress responses.
